channel.title: Aesthetic Realm - Most unique Near-Reality remake
channel.description:
[font=comic sans ms][CENTER][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/358pbhd.png[/img]
[url=http://aesthetic-realm.org]Aesthetic Realm - Powered by vBulletin[/url] [url=http://aesthetic-realm.org/vote]Aesthetic Realm - Voting[/url] [url=http://aesthetic-realm.org/wiki]http://aesthetic-realm.org/wiki[/url][/CENTER]
[CENTER][U]How we are different from other Near-Reality remakes[/U[/CENTER]
[CENTER]- Custom achievement system - Over 100+ spawns in wild - Lots of customs bosses, such as Gano, Nex, Necro, AoC, Chron and more - 3 Different game modes; Knight, King, Veteran - Proper Number formatting - Custom Dungeoneering System up to level 120 Dung with rewards - Much smoother lighting effects on NPCs, Objects, Maps, Characters, Items - Much smoother shadows, nothing choppy - Custom tooltip hovers over action items - Runescape cursors - Scrolling on all interfaces - Fully redone Pking systems - Perfect Runescape tooltips - Full slayer system, with tasks and rewards - New interfaces - Strong economy drops - Lots of useful teleports around Arpk - All original Near-Reality features - Full achievements with rewards - Custom nex with minions - MORE TO COME! We are 1 week old!
Check our youtube video out!!!
[CENTER][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTURIOUuAd4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/CENTER][/CENTER][/font]

item.title: Aesthetic Realm - Most unique Near-Reality remake
item.dc:creator: @Shady_Aftermath Shady Aftermath
item.description:
@Shady_Aftermath wrote:

[font=comic sans ms][CENTER]

Aesthetic Realm - Powered by vBulletin
Aesthetic Realm - Voting
http://aesthetic-realm.org/wiki[/CENTER]

[CENTER][U]How we are different from other Near-Reality remakes[/U[/CENTER]

[CENTER]- Custom achievement system

  • Over 100+ spawns in wild
  • Lots of customs bosses, such as Gano, Nex, Necro, AoC, Chron and more
  • 3 Different game modes; Knight, King, Veteran
  • Proper Number formatting
  • Custom Dungeoneering System up to level 120 Dung with rewards
  • Much smoother lighting effects on NPCs, Objects, Maps, Characters, Items
  • Much smoother shadows, nothing choppy
  • Custom tooltip hovers over action items
  • Runescape cursors
  • Scrolling on all interfaces
  • Fully redone Pking systems
  • Perfect Runescape tooltips
  • Full slayer system, with tasks and rewards
  • New interfaces
  • Strong economy drops
  • Lots of useful teleports around Arpk
  • All original Near-Reality features
  • Full achievements with rewards
  • Custom nex with minions
  • MORE TO COME! We are 1 week old!

Check our youtube video out!!!

[CENTER][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aTURIOUuAd4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/CENTER][/CENTER][/font]
